comment: Shes the best. Attendance is mandatory but I actually liked going to class. Weekly journals, 300 words, but easy. No quizzes/tests. 1 group project, 1 essay. 2 textbooks, only bought 1 for $7 on amazon. Uses Teams for assignments, not D2L. Lectures were sooo fun and interesting. Shes very caring and funny.

She's the best. Amazing class. Journal every week 300 words, 1 group project, 1 essay (super easy), and only a couple flipgrids but again, super easy. Attendance is mandatory but I actually liked going to class because the lectures/activities were so fun and interesting. Also 2 books, only had to buy one for like $7 on amazon, both were interesting

Took her for love and sex and I recommend her. No tests or quizzes, its a critical thinking class. Journals due every week 300 words. Flipgrid due about every month. One group project. Also an essay. Takes attendance every day. Lots of reading, from two books, only had to buy one. The books were interesting though. Great personality.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Amazing lectures

comment: She is very interested in the topics she teaches. There are weekly journals based on the readings, but extra credit is given towards the end of the semester. Overall she cares about you and what you learn from the class.

This was such a great class and she is an AMAZING professor, her lectures were awesome. The class consists of weekly discussion post that was about the lectures, readings, and your opinions over the last week, and a major paper. Now ofc because of the pandemic, we had to go online with was easy. She also offers an extra credit paper. GREAT CLASS!

I love her, she had an amazing personality and she was very devoted to what she was teaching which made you want to come to class. She let us be us and it was like free space and she was welcoming. She kept us thinking and conversating in class. She knows how to explain every concept well and answers questions. 100% recommend. Best professor ever!

Professor Duvall provided me with a great peek into KSU in my very first semester. Her lectures, announcements, and teaching methods will greatly influence the rest of your university years, as she shows you the great things KSU has to offer, such as the LGBTQ+ Center. She is very easy to talk to, so dont be afraid to ask her a question.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This professor is the greatest in and out of class. I don't see why people didn't like her class. It was really easy compared to other college classes. Like, yeah it sucks that you have to take those freshman seminar classes, but she definitely makes it as pain free as possible.

This is the worst class that I've ever taken. Everything that was turned in was based on if she liked you or not and if she thought it personally pleased her, even on opinion-based projects. My math class was easier than this seminar class. If you have to take this class then I am praying for your soul because even simple things are so difficult.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Professor Duvall is a very subjective professor. She grades based on what she believes is true, not paying attention to what the students think. She assigns WAY more work than any of the other freshman seminar professors. Do NOT recommend.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Duvall gives so much work that is nonsense and time consuming. All of my friends were chilling in their ksu class while we were stressed out. This was easily my hardest class and that in itself is ridiculous. She grades based on her personal opinions and if she doesn't like it, you're failing. She's unclear in her rubrics and grading.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: She takes a class like First Year Seminar and makes to way more harder than it needs to be.

I really loved having her as my professor. She was very down to earth and helpful to everyone. She's all about diversity and acceptance and that was a big plus for me. As long as you do the discussion posts and the campus events and services, you should do very well. My favorite professor by far.

Professor Duvall gives great lectures that keep you interested. There are mandatory discussion post but as long as you do them you will get an A. Make sure to do your campus services and events. Overall great seminar class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: There are lots of reflections but they are easy to get 100% on if you do them. There are 2 multiple choice tests and she offers extra credit

She gives good lectures. There isn't too much homework. She is very concerned with diversity and acceptance. My KSU class was more focused on how diversity and understanding my privilege. Overall I think I have benefited a lot from taking this class and I would love to take another class with her as my professor.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational
